alert.note: Alert for Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kiowa County through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eads, or 32 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Kiowa County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
